org.javasimon
Class SimonPattern

java.lang.Object
  org.javasimon.SimonPattern
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimonFilter
public final class SimonPattern
extends Object
implements SimonFilter

Matches Simon name patterns from configuration. Patterns can contain wildcard (*) that can be placed in following fashions:

  • empty string matches only Manager.ROOT_SIMON_NAME (root Simon)
  • * - matches anything
  • something - matches exactly something
  • *something - matches if tested name ends with something
  • something* - matches if tested name starts with something
  • *something* - matches if tested name contains something anywhere
  • something*else - matches if tested name starts with something and ends with else
  • anything else will throw SimonException with the message about invalid Simon pattern
Without wildcard exact match is required. Every pattern with wildcards always matches with the same string without wildcards (in other words - wildcards matches with nothing as well).
